
An intern reused the same prime in multiple RSA keys, encrypting secret data. Can you exploit this flaw and decrypt the message? Ciphertext: 146800736119476567855943463861117136651864261265392393080057137534903814779138460170426318069078173880812770422388921412198471819168588963126078237317015131760297782882304709322348006716954049032198828052038643596105014516522052049


The flag format is flag{...}
n=609432630999856071284591574733151414326386611295298959514174601384705645128891509137101641423101517512620159310005649462020157981428653591337686022920786764698102824186935601996679915013340168495113284753580514576449132163574880689, e=462087439138650711180295896966367528966787062067148121040451015061382970913170125479163770730905064459844672278634734869864526566406682039697556437635514899488355838931711632917693673565523509775323310707210220297884604346913653505

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{kju5zg4s}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 146800736119476567855943463861117136651864261265392393080057137534903814779138460170426318069078173880812770422388921412198471819168588963126078237317015131760297782882304709322348006716954049032198828052038643596105014516522052049
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=609432630999856071284591574733151414326386611295298959514174601384705645128891509137101641423101517512620159310005649462020157981428653591337686022920786764698102824186935601996679915013340168495113284753580514576449132163574880689, e=462087439138650711180295896966367528966787062067148121040451015061382970913170125479163770730905064459844672278634734869864526566406682039697556437635514899488355838931711632917693673565523509775323310707210220297884604346913653505
extra_info: p=24686689348712922775587464646237587512607713399965546255455834796251457804082344517176656713811969477693364229719367, q=24686689348712922775587464646237587512607713399965546255455834796251457804082344517176656713811969477693364229719367, Ï†(n)=609432630999856071284591574733151414326386611295298959514174601384705645128891509137101641423101517512620159310005600088641460555583102416408393547745761549271302893094424690327087412097732003806078931440152890637493745435115441956
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
